sentence.Network_en: Straighten left leg, pull it backward from the hip.
sentence.Network_cn: 打直左腿, 用胯部将其向后拉.

sentence.Network_en: Just for a leg - pull, let's tell Arthur we've all got to work on Christmas Day.
sentence.Network_cn: 只是开个玩笑, 让我们告诉阿瑟,圣诞节我们都得上班.

sentence.Network_en: The pull-out of the army paves the way for independence.
sentence.Network_cn: 军队的撤出为独立铺平了道路。

list.abs: [申精]常用俚语、习语_杨凡雨吧_百度贴吧 ... psycho 疯子 pull one's leg 开玩笑 push around 驱使（某人）.
PULL - 英汉词典 ... pull no punches 不客气,动真格的 pull one's leg 开某人的玩笑 pull oneself together 恢复镇定.
4美国口语俚语 -... ... Knock it off. 不要这个样子 Stop pulling my leg. 不要开我玩笑了 You are out of line. 你太过份了.
未分类 - - Nicolas’ Blog - Upholstery ... stop by 过来一会 stop pulling my leg 不要开玩笑了 storm in a teacup 大惊小怪.

means.word_mean: 1. as a joke: trying to make somebody believe something that is not true
